ygData.subject: Re: Whats Up!?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/18/99 10:36:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time, 2as1@home.com writes: What is wrong with this list? I think fletching (now that one success at
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/18/99 10:36:36 AM Eastern Daylight Time, 2as1@...
writes:

What is wrong with this list? I think fletching (now that one success at
making arrows equals 5 arrows instead of one) is Da Bomb! I just wanted
to know if anyone out there knew if there are better quality components
out there than you can readily buy from NPC's. Any one have some ideas?
Kronalin
Ranger of Prexus >>


The major problem with this is that it now takes 5 times as much money to
raise
skill as it did before. It's nice to be able to fletch faster, but it's not
worth the 400
percent increase in training costs. Past skill 122 it takes around 50
platinum per
point of skill, which is insane. We're talking about arrows, things made out
of
wood. We should be melting our platinum down and making arrow shafts out of
that :) it'd be cheaper!
